description: Elemental intangibility Devil Fruits - most powerful type

fruits.name: Moku Moku no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke. Can trap enemies and create smokescreens.

abilities.name: White Out
abilities.description: Create a thick smokescreen that reduces enemy accuracy

abilities.name: White Snake
abilities.description: Launch smoke tendrils to bind and damage enemies

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Smoke can be used to fill rooms and obscure vision

mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Environmental Smoke Domination - control all smoke in area

fruits.name: Mera Mera no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire. One of the most powerful offensive Logia fruits.

abilities.name: Fire Fist
abilities.description: Launch a powerful fist of flames at the enemy

abilities.name: Flame Pillar
abilities.description: Create massive pillars of fire to engulf multiple enemies

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Fire attacks stronger in hot/dry areas, weaker in rain/water

mastery_bonuses.level_3: Fire attacks ignore 20% of enemy defense
mastery_bonuses.level_5: Can create fire walls for protection
mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Great Flame Emperor - create and control massive fire constructs

fruits.name: Suna Suna no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand. Can absorb moisture and create sandstorms.

abilities.name: Desert Spada
abilities.description: Create a blade of sand to slice through enemies

abilities.name: Ground Death
abilities.description: Absorb all moisture from enemies, causing extreme dehydration

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Extremely powerful in deserts, vulnerable when wet

mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Desert Desertification - transform surroundings into desert

fruits.name: Goro Goro no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into lightning. Considered one of the most powerful Devil Fruits.

abilities.name: El Thor
abilities.description: Strike enemies with a massive lightning bolt from above

abilities.name: Raigo
abilities.description: Create a massive sphere of lightning to devastate the battlefield

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Can restart heart if stopped, enhanced power in storms

mastery_bonuses.level_5: Can move at lightning speed in short bursts
mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: 200 Million Volt Amaru - transform into massive lightning god form

fruits.name: Hie Hie no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice. Can freeze anything including the ocean itself.

abilities.name: Ice Saber
abilities.description: Create a sword of ice to strike enemies

abilities.name: Ice Age
abilities.description: Freeze the entire battlefield in ice

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Can freeze water to create platforms, stronger in cold

mastery_bonuses.level_3: Ice attacks slow enemies for 2 turns
mastery_bonuses.level_7: Enhanced intangibility and ice creation speed
mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Ice Time Capsule - freeze time itself in localized areas

fruits.name: Yami Yami no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into darkness. Unique ability to nullify other Devil Fruit powers and absorb attacks.

abilities.name: Black Hole
abilities.description: Create a vortex of darkness that pulls in enemies

abilities.name: Liberation
abilities.description: Release everything absorbed by darkness as a devastating attack

weaknesses: Takes DOUBLE damage from all sources
strengths: Can nullify Devil Fruit powers on touch

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Absorbs light and attacks, stronger in darkness
special_mechanics.special_ability: Devil Fruit Nullification - can disable enemy Devil Fruit on contact

mastery_bonuses.level_3: Can absorb and release smaller attacks
mastery_bonuses.level_7: Can absorb one attack per turn without damage
mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Kurouzu - massive black hole that consumes everything

fruits.name: Pika Pika no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into light. Grants light-speed movement and powerful laser attacks.

abilities.name: Light Speed Kick
abilities.description: Move at light speed and deliver a devastating kick

abilities.name: Yasakani Sacred Jewel
abilities.description: Fire countless light projectiles at enemies

weaknesses: Requires reflective surfaces for some techniques

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Can travel via reflection, faster in open areas
special_mechanics.speed_priority: Always moves first in turn order

mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Light Man - become pure light with perfect intangibility

fruits.name: Magu Magu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma. Superior to fire-based abilities in offensive power.

abilities.name: Great Eruption
abilities.description: Launch a massive fist of magma that explodes on impact

abilities.name: Meteor Volcano
abilities.description: Rain down countless magma fists from the sky

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Magma can burn through most defenses
special_mechanics.element_superiority: Deals double damage to fire-based abilities

mastery_bonuses.level_3: Magma burns deal damage over 3 turns
mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Ryusei Kazan - transform entire battlefield into volcanic hellscape

fruits.name: Gasu Gasu no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into various types of gas, including poisonous and combustible gases.

abilities.name: Gas Robe
abilities.description: Emit poisonous gas to damage and poison enemies

abilities.name: Shinokuni
abilities.description: Release deadly petrifying gas that turns victims to stone

mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Land of the Dead - create massive poison gas death zone

fruits.name: Yuki Yuki no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into snow. Can create snowstorms and freeze enemies.

abilities.name: Snow Sword
abilities.description: Create blades of compressed snow to slash enemies

abilities.name: Blizzard
abilities.description: Create a massive snowstorm to engulf the battlefield

strengths: Snow is harder to melt than ice

special_mechanics.environmental_synergy: Extremely powerful in winter/cold, weaker in heat

mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Eternal Winter - transform area into frozen wasteland

fruits.name: Numa Numa no Mi
fruits.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into swamp/mud. Can absorb and store objects and people.

abilities.name: Swamp Sink
abilities.description: Pull enemies into bottomless swamp

abilities.name: Storage Release
abilities.description: Release stored weapons/objects as projectiles
effects: Variable Damage based on stored items

mastery_bonuses.level_3: Can store more items and people
mastery_bonuses.level_10_awakening: Swamp Domain - transform surroundings into massive swampland

abilities.name: Ability Name
abilities.description: What the ability does

notes: Logia fruits are rare and powerful - should be limited in number and carefully balanced
